sentences.en: "I thought you were bringing it." — "Heavens, no."
sentences.cn: “我以为你会带来的。”——“天哪，不会吧。”

sentences.en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentences.cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentences.en: He seemed to be a good man, well thought of by all.
sentences.cn: 大家都对他评价不错，他似乎是个好人。

sentences.en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentences.en: Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
sentences.cn: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

sentences.en: I had a persecution complex and thought people were conspiring against me.
sentences.cn: 我有过被害情结，认为大家都在密谋暗算我。

sentences.en: I thought a phonetic spelling might aid in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 我想语音拼写可能有助于发音。

sentences.en: I thought I'd, you know, have a chat with you.
sentences.cn: 我想我应该，呃，和你谈谈。

sentences.en: I thought Sue would be a good influence on you.
sentences.cn: 我认为苏能对你产生良好影响。

sentences.en: I thought they were laughing at me because I was ugly.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他们嘲笑我是因为我长得丑。

sentences.en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentences.cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentences.en: I thought, "Here'ssomeone who'll understand me." So I wrote to her.
sentences.cn: 我想：“这个人会理解我的。”于是开始给她写信。

sentences.en: It is thought that a management buyout is one option.
sentences.cn: 管理层收购被认为是一种选择。

sentences.en: not one of them &B{gave a second thought to} the risks involved.
sentences.cn: 他们中没有一个人对所涉及的危险做进一步考虑。

sentences.en: Some thought must be given to the method of validation.
sentences.cn: 一些想法必须通过验证法加以证实。

sentences.en: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.cn: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

sentences.en: those of us who work at home may find our hands a thought freer.
sentences.cn: 我们中那些在家工作的人可能发现手头稍稍闲了些。

sentences.en: We would have thought he would have a more responsible attitude.
sentences.cn: 我们本以为他会采取更负责的态度。
